TemplateDescription.name: consumablelibrary

Argument.name: namespace
Argument.help: The root namespace for the consumable library. It is used to resolve the initial class namespace.

TemplateDescription.Description: Create a new consumable library. The consumable library is a template creates a library which can be used by other projects. For more information visit the Help Center in the PLCnext Community.

Example.Description: creates a new consumable library in the directory 'LibraryName' with the namespace 'LibraryName'
creates a new consumable library in the directory 'LibraryName' with the namespace 'SomeNamespace'
